inclusion.criterion: Potassium and estimated glomerular filtration rate (eGFR)
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Cohort 1: sK+ 5.1-5.9 mEq/L at screening/study enrolment and eGFR ≥30 mL/min/1.73 m2;
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Cohort 2: Normokalaemic (sK+ 3.5-5.0 mEq/L) at screening and 'at risk' of developing HK defined as either:
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Have a history of HK (sK+ >5.0 mEq/L) within the prior 24 months and eGFR ≥30 mL/min/1.73 m2, or
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: sK+ ≥4.5 mEq/L and eGFR 30 to 60 mL/min/1.73 m2 and/or age >75 years
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Symptomatic HFrEF (New York Heart Association [NYHA] class II-IV), which has been present for at least 3 months
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Receiving angiotensin-converting enzyme inhibitor (ACEi), angiotensin II receptor blocker (ARB), or angiotensin receptor-Neprilysin inhibitor (ARNi) (stable dose for ≥4 weeks)
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: Not on spironolactone or eplerenone, or on low-dose spironolactone (<25 mg daily).
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Receiving beta-blocker (stable dose for ≥4 weeks) unless contraindicated.
inclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: constrictive pericarditis, hypertrophic (obstructive) cardiomyopathy, or severe stenotic valve disease as a primary cause of HF
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current inpatient hospitalisation due to HF
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Previous cardiac transplantation or implantation of a ventricular assistance device (VAD) or similar device, or transplantation or implantation expected after randomisation
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: The patient is a 3-day-old female infant with jaundice that started one day ago. She was born at 34w of gestation and kept in an incubator due to her gestational age.
